scripts.c: g++ main.cpp AsymmetricEncryption/asymmetricEncryption.cpp Caesar/caesar.cpp ShannonFano/shannonFano.cpp Encryption/encryption.cpp BigInt/bigInt.cpp MyMath/myMath.cpp -O3 -std=c++20 -g -o a.out && ./a.out
scripts.test: g++ tests.cpp AsymmetricEncryption/asymmetricEncryption.cpp Encryption/encryption.cpp BigInt/bigInt.cpp MyMath/myMath.cpp -O3 -std=c++20 -g -o a.out && ./a.out
scripts.testOmp: g++ tests.cpp AsymmetricEncryption/asymmetricEncryption.cpp Encryption/encryption.cpp BigInt/bigInt.cpp MyMath/myMath.cpp -O3 -std=c++20 -g -o a.out && ./a.out
scripts.testCaesar: g++ Caesar/tests.cpp Caesar/caesar.cpp Encryption/encryption.cpp BigInt/bigInt.cpp MyMath/myMath.cpp -O3 -std=c++20 -g -o a.out && ./a.out
scripts.testShannon: g++ ShannonFano/tests.cpp ShannonFano/shannonFano.cpp Encryption/encryption.cpp BigInt/bigInt.cpp MyMath/myMath.cpp -O3 -std=c++20 -g -o a.out && ./a.out
